component.name: Anytype
component.summary: The everything app for those who celebrate trust and autonomy

description.p: Anytype is a local-first, E2E encrypted software designed as a secure place to create and store digital assets.
You can use Anytype to create and connect your tasks, notes, ideas, documents, workflows, and more.

Future versions will allow you to share your work and safely collaborate with others. Our long-term vision is for Anytype to enable large-scale collaboration to create a global repository of interconnected knowledge.
Explore the documentation to learn more about using the product, troubleshooting your account, and data privacy.
